thread.section_title: Reuters: Financial Services and Real Estate
thread.title: Germany keen for dialogue with U.S. on trade, finance minister tells ARD

title: Germany keen for dialogue with U.S. on trade, finance minister tells ARD
text: March 18, 2018 / 3:53 PM / Updated 13 minutes ago Germany keen for dialogue with U.S. on trade, finance minister tells ARD Reuters Staff 1 Min Read BERLIN, March 18 (Reuters) - Germany Economy Minister Peter Altmaier said it was important to start a dialogue with the United States about planned U.S. trade sanctions, but it was unclear if differences between Washington and Brussels could be resolved by the end of the week. Altmaier told German broadcaster ARD that Germany and the European Union were keen to avoid a trade war with Washington. He stressed that Europe would not let itself be divided by the United States. Reporting by Hans-Edzard Busemann Writing by Andrea Shalal Editing by Catherine Evans
